normal.name: Light Strike
normal.description: Deals fire damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemy unit.

auto.name: Big! Big! Big! Treasure Sword!
auto.description: Deals fire damage equal to 240% of Attack to enemy unit

ultimate.name: Flawless Sword
ultimate.description: Rushes to enemy and deals fire damage equal to 480% of Attack

passive.name: Heroes Won't Retreat in Battle! (被动英雄不会临阵退缩！)
passive.description: When normal attacks hit the same target, gain 2 layers of [Focus], each layer increases critical rate by 2.8%, maximum 10 layers

awakenings.effect: When [Focus] reaches 10 stacks: Normal attacks additionally deal 20% of Attack as fire damage
Each normal attack targeting same enemy: Additionally adds one [Focus] stack
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
When [Focus] reaches 10 stacks: Normal attack critical hit damage increased by 50%

memoryCard.name: Heroes, Never Stop
effects: When the number of enemies on field is less than 2: Increase critical hit damage by 72%
